query:
CREATE TABLE monitoring_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  landing_page_id INT NOT NULL,
  check_type ENUM('content_change', 'link_broken') NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('ok', 'changed', 'error') NOT NULL,
  message TEXT,
  screenshot_url TEXT,
  previous_screenshot_url TEXT,
  diff_image_url TEXT,
  diff_top_third VARCHAR(20),
  diff_middle_third VARCHAR(20),
  diff_bottom_third VARCHAR(20),
  region_analysis TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
